prototypes.prototype: SaveDataAsFile as L (FileName as C, Value as C, RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as L = .T.)
SaveDataAsFile as L (FileName as C, Value as B, RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as L = .T.)

argument.name: FileName as C
argument.description: The name of the file to be saved. This name should not have any path components.

argument.name: Value as C
argument.description: The characters to be saved. The characters are converted to a UTF-8 stream of bytes that are saved. RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as T This is reserved for future use.

page.description: Saves the value to the session-state collection under IIS.
page.discussion: Context.Session.SaveDataAsFile() saves the value to the session-state collection under IIS. Under the stand-alone application server, the value is written to disk in the stand-alone application server's session folder. Check Context.Session.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
